Identification.LongTitle: United Nations Medal for Special Services Order (MINURCA)

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby

Provision.Label: (a)
Provision.Text: authorizes Canadians to accept and wear the United Nations Mission in the Central African Republic (MINURCA) Medal in recognition of honourable service with the United Nations Mission in the Central African Republic; and

Provision.Label: (b)
Provision.Text: directs that that Medal follow the United Nations Mission in Guatemala (MINUGUA) Medal in the order of precedence in the Canadian Honours System.
